name: OhShape Full Version
abstract: OhShape is a rhythm game offering a unique way of moving your whole body. Dodge obstacles, punch walls, and make fun poses to get through each map.

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, German, Spanish, French, Korean
detail.app_release_note:
A new quality of life update is here!

This version includes:

- A new visual style on the covers for all songs - they couldn't look any cooler!
- Sound experience has reached new grounds of quality!
- Our disclaimers also got a revamp to ensure everyone enjoys the experience and have solutions at hand at all times!
- And as always, many improvements here and there, and removed a couple small bugs :)

Enjoy this new and upgraded version of OhShape and do not stop dancing!
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo2, PICO 4, PICO Neo2 Wigig, PICO Neo2 Eye, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro
